properties.areaDesc: Perry, MS; George, MS; Greene, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 2:01PM CST until January 7 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a flood warning for the
following rivers in Mississippi...

Leaf Near Mclain affecting George...Greene and Perry Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is forecast to occur over the next 24 hours. As a result...river
levels are forecast to rise and a flood warning is now in effect. It is
emphasized that the following forecast is based on the expected rainfall during
the next 24 hours. If less rainfall occurs...it may be necessary to revise this
stage forecast downward.

The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Leaf Near Mclain
* From late Monday night until Tuesday afternoon
* At 1 PM Friday the stage was...13.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by early Tuesday morning and continue to
rise near 18 feet by early Tuesday morning. The river will fall below flood
stage by Tuesday afternoon.
* At 18 feet...Considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the
river.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
